entry.tran: 巨子;巨人;成就非凡的人
entry.def: If you describe someone as a titan of a particular field, you mean that they are very important and powerful or successful in that field.

example.tran: 该国最富有的两位商业巨子

example.ex: …the titans of Renaissance literature: Spenser, Shakespeare, Donne and Milton.
example.tran: 文艺复兴时期的文学巨擘：斯宾塞、莎士比亚、多恩与弥尔顿

means.word_mean: 1. a person of exceptional importance and reputation
